data.name: BEATBOX BATTLE
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the official virtual platform of Beatbox Battle, and the Beatbox Battle World Championship. Watch live streams, explore exhibitions, take part in beatbox related events, or play the game.

Events
Follow Beatbox Battle events by watching the live streams, at various in-game locations live and recorded video streams are on display.

Gaming
The Beatbox Battle game offers many pathways for players to develop their character, while exploring the game world. However, there is no requirement for people to actually play the game, if they just want to watch and explore beatbox related events.

  • Character creation, create a character with your name.
  • Character progression, unlock new stats points by leveling-up.
  • Interact with others to solve quests, or for trading.
  • The leaderboard ranks the best players.




Planned features
  • Multiplayer
  • Voice chat enables users to participate in events or to simply communicate with each other.

data.short_description: Live streamed events from Beatbox Battle, art, and more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 12000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
